name: 拉法埃尔·巴尔克
name_full: 拉法埃尔·巴尔克 Raphael Barker
introduction: 身高：五英尺九英寸（约175公分）体重：130磅（118斤）【真的很瘦啊】年龄：约20~30岁，具体不详自我简介：I am an actor and occasional songwriter. You saw me in Shortbus. I am a traveler and writer. Sent down to earth to hurt. Love. Decompose. "The Stranger In Us" is the working title of the new feature film that features me as lead. I CAN'T WAIT for it to come out. I am so proud of the work we did on it; its currently in post production. I may do a poem for it as well. Maybe some music! I just wrapped my character in the upcoming film "Tweaker With An Axe" by Synchronium Films http://tweakerwithanaxe.com/ keep checking back for updates. You can also find out more about a feature length film I did right after SHORTBUS called document· The myspace profile for this film is in my top friends list. It still need festival exposure so if you have any leads please contact the director!!! Thank you SO MUCH!! ..出演作品：《迷宫》(Strapped)《同是陌生人》(The Stranger in Us)《性爱巴士》（Shortbus）等
